categories.name: AI Technology & Architecture
categories.description: Core AI technologies, models, and computational infrastructure including machine learning, deep learning, foundation models, and hardware systems.

categories.name: AI Governance & Ethics
categories.description: Frameworks, policies, and standards for responsible AI development including safety, security, transparency, accountability, and ethical considerations.

categories.name: Data & Infrastructure
categories.description: Data management, processing systems, cloud platforms, edge computing, and digital infrastructure enabling AI deployment.

categories.name: Industry Applications
categories.description: AI solutions and use cases across specific sectors including healthcare, finance, agriculture, defense, energy, and manufacturing.

categories.name: Skills & Workforce Development
categories.description: Education, training, and talent development programs for AI literacy, engineering, and workforce readiness across all skill levels.

categories.name: Business & Entrepreneurship
categories.description: AI-driven business models, startups, venture capital, consulting, and commercial solutions for enterprise adoption.

categories.name: Geopolitics & Global Strategy
categories.description: National security, sovereign AI, geopolitical implications, cross-border collaboration, and global governance of AI development.

categories.name: Social Impact & Inclusion
categories.description: AI applications for social good, digital inclusion, equity, human rights, and addressing global challenges like climate and food security.

categories.name: Digital Transformation & Services
categories.description: Digital modernization, IT services, business intelligence, automation, and digital solutions for organizations and public services.

categories.name: Specialized AI Domains
categories.description: Advanced and emerging AI applications including computer vision, conversational AI, robotics, autonomous systems, and quantum computing.

categories.name: Research & Innovation
categories.description: AI research, evaluation methodologies, open-source initiatives, and innovation ecosystems advancing AI capabilities and knowledge.

categories.name: Regulatory & Legal Frameworks
categories.description: Data protection, AI policy, standards, compliance, and legal mechanisms governing AI deployment and data usage.
